# VEHICLE::ALLOW_AMBIENT_VEHICLES_TO_AVOID_ADVERSE_CONDITIONS

## Summary
Allow/disable ambient vehicles pathing around adverse conditions

## Parameters
* **BOOL** allow: Whether to enable it or not (default is TRUE / enabled)

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Depricated, this function no longer does anything, left in to not break scripts

This native doesn't seem to do anything, might be a debug-only native.

Confirmed, it is a debug native.
